item.title: The 10 Best Fights Across All 6 Live-Action TMNT Movies
item.description: The teenage mutant ninja turtles have seen a lot of battles in their live-action variations, with some holding up better than others when compared.

item.title: 10 Post-Credits Scenes That Weren't Worth Waiting Around For
item.description: While post-credits scenes can often add exciting new information to a film, others felt like they just weren't worth waiting around for.

item.title: The Merry Gentlemen Soundtrack Guide: Every Song & When They Play In Netflix's Christmas Movie
item.description: Netflix's The Merry Gentlemen blends together multiple genres of music to create a memorable soundtrack that's perfect for the holidays.
